hedline.hl1: Kohl's Names Agency For Broadcast Media

abstract.p: Kohl's Department Stores names McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising as agency of record to handle its broadcast media account, which had been handled by J Walter Thompson (M)

block.p: Kohl's Department Stores has named the New York office of McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising as agency of record to handle its broadcast media account, with billings estimated at $100 million. The assignment had been handled for four years by the Detroit office of J. Walter Thompson, part of the WPP Group.

Julie Gardner, senior vice president for marketing at Kohl's in Menomonee Falls, Wis., said the change came after four or five months of undisclosed talks with selected agencies that she declined to identify.

Kohl's Department Stores has named the New York office of McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising as agency of record to handle its broadcast media account, with billings estimated at $100 million. The assignment had been handled for four years by the Detroit office of J. Walter Thompson, part of the WPP Group.

Julie Gardner, senior vice president for marketing at Kohl's in Menomonee Falls, Wis., said the change came after four or five months of undisclosed talks with selected agencies that she declined to identify.
''At this critical point in our growth,'' Ms. Gardner said, referring to the expansion of Kohl's into markets like metropolitan New York, ''we felt we needed to explore other options.''
The print portion of the Kohl's account remains in house. McCann-Erickson is part of the McCann-Erickson World Group, which is owned by the Interpublic Group of Companies.
